current_contact.agency: San Bernardino County Sheriff Department - Coroner Division

case_address_found_1: Found in rock formations 12 miles SE of  Baker, 2 miles W of Kelbaker Rd.
case_circumstances:
"John Doe #02-74"  was found decomposed on 03/31/1974 in a remote desert rock formation near Baker, CA. He is described as a White male adult, approximately 20-39 years of age, 5'5"-5'7", 140-150 lbs, with long Red/Brown hair and a Red/Brown beard and mustache. 

Identity may only be established with dental X-rays (on file and see attached), head X-rays, and DNA (to be submitted October 2010).  Possible comparison with "smiling photographs" or "talking video" (showing teeth).
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
